title: What ships don't make any sense lore-wise?
body:
What are some ships that don't make any sense if you think about the new lore?

The first one that comes to my mind is {{champion:92}}x{{champion:154}}

replies.body:
Ironside Malphite doesn't make any sense... Why its called IRONside if its mostly made out of wood?

Sentient ships are weird.
I forgot the name of the skin and for a second thought it was legit ship and it was Ivern x Malph and was... Little confused.
Just about all of them. Pick two characters at random. Odds are, it's not supported by canon; ergo, it doesn't make sense.

> [{quoted}](name=IlyaK1986,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-14T20:47:15.533+0000)
>
> Just about all of them. Pick two characters at random. Odds are, it's not supported by canon; ergo, it doesn't make sense.

{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}  OTP

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainAntiHeroz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-14T20:51:12.244+0000)
>
> {{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}  OTP

As I said. At random. The chance of picking Xayah + Rakan *at random* is more than 1/10,000.
Gangplank's ship. It was destroyed by MF yet he still can call for a cannon barrage from the ship and can even pay for cannon upgrades

{{champion:202}} x {{champion:37}} 
I seen It several times on instagram. Just no, leave my man alone. I hope my other man {{champion:50}} is safe from those ship horrors.
Swain is canonically banging LeBlanc.  Confirmed by him.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2019-10-15T03:27:24.193+0000)
>
> Swain is canonically banging LeBlanc.  Confirmed by him.

Even If that's true, I don't believe they are in a love relationship.

Oh yeah no, they're just... uuhhhh... _enemies_ with benefits.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Thats not even my joke.  That's straight outta Swain's mouth.
Where has he said that? Please direct me to this piece of information, I MUST CONFIRM!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

"I suppose this makes us, enemies with benefits?"
The first time he encounters her in a match.
Not quite right. That's his taunt towards an allied LeBlanc. The line is most likely referring to them being on the same team and not meant to imply any sexual relationship.

{{champion:145}}  x {{champion:161}} 
But I don't complain. The art of these 2 getting along is really good.

Riven and Zac don't make sense yes.

I would say {{champion:86}}  and {{champion:55}}. Garen is the captain of a battalion of soldiers, he is very strict towards magic (but in the comics of Lux, we saw his kind side with his sister) but he is still very loyal to his country and i'm not sure he should love Noxians people. I don't understand how Garen can fall in love with a noxian and especially an assassin, it's make no sense. Katarina have killed Demacians people, she is a murderer. 

From Katarina side, her personnality don't really fit to love Garen. The only common point of both would be their loyalty to their nations but if they are loyal, they won't try to love someone who is an enemy of their nation. 

I don't undestand this ship, i know it's popular but from a lore perspective, i don't think it's make sense. 


Then i would say {{champion:44}} and {{champion:81}} because they never have met. Taric don't know about the existence of Ezreal and reciprocally so how can they fall in love together if they didn't know each other ? 

{{champion:126}} x {{champion:254}} : Their characters are so different, i can't imagine them together. Jayce is a scientist who is proud of himself and Vi is a tomboy who loves to kick asses. Vi would probably be pissed at Jayce bragging and end up to crush his face. Jayce would always consider Vi as a "idiot" and told her she is "inferior" or things like that. {{champion:51}} x {{champion:254}} would be more suited. 


{{champion:4}} x {{champion:28}} : Even if they share a common skin, let's be honest, if Evelyn was with TF, he would be dead. You can't be in a relationship with Evelyn, she is a demon. TF is a player, he loves risk his luck to games but i'm not sure he would risk his life in bed. 

{{champion:1}} x {{champion:32}} : It's may look cute at first but don't forget Amumu is a mummy and Annie is a little girl who isn't at legal age. Amumu is probably very old, like 100 or 1000 years old, he is a mummy so he can live forever since it's a spirit in a dead body wrapped in strips. A little girl with a 1000 years old mummy is weird if you think about it. We can suppose that Annie can break Amumu curse and be his friend but then we would have to precise Amumu age to make them a couple.

Romance forged in the fires of desperation.  Romeo and Juliet.  They're star crossed lovers.  They love each other as individuals.  They can't be together because they're both loyal to their nations.  That's the entire point of Garen and Kat.

The current known iteration of how they met had his men detaining her, she escaped, but he cuffed himself to her.  Then a giant monster showed up and they had to work together to survive.  I could link you the storyboard for it.  You'll get to hear kat calling him an asshole! :)

Romeo and Juliet in a very dark way then, Katarian killed people and she could have killed some of Garen's soldiers. 

Maybe they are like star crossed lover who can't love each other because of their nation but i don't think Garen would love someone who have murdered his people (or maybe love is more powerful than justice and reason ?). Katarina would be able to forget Garen crimes towards Noxus but Garen... 

But the thing is that if we agree with this relationship, then we agree that Garen have lose his values about Demacia and everything. He is not anymore the "strict" and "ruthless" soldier he was and he could do some things against Demacia for love. It's could be interesting to break Garen image of the true defender of Demacia with no flaws and add him a dark side like this.

Romeo also killed 8 people.  
Some of Juliets family included. Also his own best friend. 
And himself.
And his crush, a 14 year old girl. Romeo killed children.
Thirteen.  The original script had it as her 13th birthday when they met.

kata most likely rarely if ever kills soldiers, she's an assassin she goes after people higher in rank, garen on the other hand has probably killed plenty of soldiers. 

> But the thing is that if we agree with this relationship, then we agree that Garen have lose his values about Demacia and everything.

so have we forgotten lux already? the "filthy mage scum" that is his own sister? garen's conflict between being the ideal demacian soldier and his feelings is pretty much his whole character. lux is a part of that and kata would only add to that. He'd be a pretty boring character without this part.

Justice has nothing to do with this. It is a war between these nations and both Garen and Kat are just soldiers serving their nation.

Ofc Garen and Kat's relationship is rocky from the very beginning, but that doesn't mean they won't understand each other and, eventually, respect each other.

And there is already a small dark side of Garen revealed in Lux' comic. He defends those he cares about of Demacia's society and doesn't always agree with Demacia's ideology of "Justice" (even tho he doesn't show it).
I'm actually interested in reading this story.  Got a link?
I mean Nidalee could be gay who knows. She just didn't like Neeko at the time.
Was it even confirmed Nid _didn't_ like Neeko?  All I remember was Nid wouldn't leave the forest for her.
I think a Rioter said somewhere that Neeko liked Nid, but that the feeling was unrequited.

Yeah a Rioter said it was unrequited. I mean that might be because Neeko was leaving her for all we know. 

It certainly doesn't mean Nidalee is straight though.
~~She must be into some kinky 'mating' then. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)~~
Anything is possible!
{{champion:76}} x{{champion:107}} , as far as I rememeber he killed her adoptive mom. Also {{champion:86}} x{{champion:99}} , please don't, they're siblings.

sorry to break it to you, but out of all of Ahri's ships that's the one that makes the most sense lore wise as he's the only champ that's even listed under her related champs or is even remotely tied to her lore. Not saying it's a thing, but facts are facts.
 https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/ahri/
Downvote me all you want, the fact is that it's just a really unpopular ship and it's cause he has any relation to her that people hate him being related to Ahri in any way.

I love this ship, my favorite one ! Ahri and Wukong look so cute together... 

And yeah, it's would make sense because Ahri only friend is Wukong... It's the only champ who is in her "friends" list when you check her profile. 

I'm an Ahri main btw and i love Wukong mains... I always try to play Ahri when someone play Wukong in my team.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2019-10-15T16:49:00.024+0000)
>
> sorry to break it to you, but out of all of Ahri's ships that's the one that makes the most sense lore wise as he's the only champ that's even listed under her related champs or is even remotely tied to her lore. Not saying it's a thing, but facts are facts.
>  https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/ahri/
> Downvote me all you want, the fact is that it's just a really unpopular ship and it's cause he has any relation to her that people hate him being related to Ahri in any way.

yeah ok buddy
{{champion:35}} X{{champion:117}}

Honestly I completely forgot that Riven x Zac used to be a thing.

It was mainly done because Zac's silhouette actually appears in battle bunny rivens splash. So yeah this ship was created just because of a small early-bird-cameo to tease Zacs release that went unnoticed by most.

{{champion:30}} and {{champion:10}} in pentakill.
I mean it'd be cool in a non sexual way but that's not how the internet works

Actually Taric and Garen could be possible. Don't forget Garen was Taric best friend. 

{{champion:86}} and {{champion:44}} is more likely to happend than {{champion:44}} x {{champion:81}}  because Taric never have met Ezreal. 

Ofc i don't think Garen and Taric would be together but it's could make sense since they was friends.
Garen hates Taric though...

He don't hates him, he has simply given up on defending him for his actions. That doesn't mean Garen would stabb Taric if he goes back to Demacia. 

Also i love people disliking, like you can't have ideas and share your toughts, you must think like the majority... so stupid but np.
Alright, Xano. Whatever you say.

Garen was also the one that sent Taric to die on Targon.
Even if Taric was romantically interested in Garen and went back to Demacia to pursue it, that doesn't meant Garen feels the same way. Garen could try to kill him for all we know.

> [{quoted}](name=StormBladeMaster,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-14T21:05:14.770+0000)
>
> Actually Taric and Garen could be possible. Don't forget Garen was Taric best friend. 
> 
> {{champion:86}} and {{champion:44}} is more likely to happend than {{champion:44}} x {{champion:81}}  because Taric never have met Ezreal. 
> 
> Ofc i don't think Garen and Taric would be together but it's could make sense since they was friends.

No dude, Taric is an aspect and was BANISHED to probably die climbing Mount Targon, BY GAREN

Garen was forced to ban him (hierarchy orders). Doesn't mean he wanted to do it. 

And then, he could feel regrets for his actions. 

Also aspects don't have the right to feel love ?

> [{quoted}](name=StormBladeMaster,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6XugaIml,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2019-10-14T21:22:56.320+0000)
>
> Garen was forced to ban him (hierarchy orders). Doesn't mean he wanted to do it. 
> 
> And then, he could feel regrets for his actions. 
> 
> Also aspects don't have the right to feel love ?

"Taric’s casual nature, disregard for orders, and disinterest in his patriotic calling finally put him at odds with nearly everyone in authority—his family, his king, and especially his long-time friend Garen. And while the commoners saw Taric as a charming rogue, Garen recognized him for what he truly was—a man with the potential to become one of Demacia’s greatest heroes. The fact that Taric seemed to be thumbing his nose at his destiny as well as his country enraged Garen."
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/taric.html

Nothing to do with "right to feel love" it just doesn't make sense at all
Though they are friends Garen is pissed at him, plus Riot has hinted at Garen and Kat for a long time and though it was retconned with the League itself, with Garen's newfound awareness and the fact that he is now more open minded than J4 it's entirely possible **that it gets canonized in the future**, AT THE VERY LEAST more reasonable than Taric and Garen
